# Life Odyssey Blog

> A personal tech blog by Zhenjia Zhou covering algorithms, machine learning, software development, and cloud architecture.

## Site Information

- URL: https://blog.zhenjia.org
- Author: Zhenjia Zhou
- Languages: Chinese (primary), English, Japanese
- Theme: Retypeset (Astro-based static site)

## Content Categories

- **Algorithms**: Binary search, dynamic programming, graph algorithms, LeetCode solutions
- **Machine Learning**: Neural networks, Bayesian methods, deep learning
- **Cloud & DevOps**: AWS, Kubernetes, CI/CD, infrastructure as code
- **Software Development**: Java, Python, TypeScript, system design
- **Career**: Job hunting, interview preparation, professional growth

## Key URLs

- Posts: /posts/{abbrlink}.html
- Tags: /tags/
- Search: /search/
- About: /about/
- RSS Feed: /rss.xml
- Atom Feed: /atom.xml
- Sitemap: /sitemap-index.xml

## API Endpoints

- Search Index: /pagefind/pagefind-entry.json
- Full-text search available at /search/

## Language URLs

- Chinese (default): /
- English: /en/
- Japanese: /ja/
